job_title: In Home Caregiver in Madison, AL
cons: Wish there was more job flexibility

review_title: Great first job, great sense of community
pros: It has flexible hours and a great sense of community while working in the kitchen
cons: Sometimes short staffed and definitely has times where you are very busy or very not

review_title: Overall a good place to work
pros: Good hours, many positions, opportunities for growth and training, as needed hours are flexible for school and second jobs
cons: Sometimes short-staffed, lapses in communication, employee burnout

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Middleton, WI
pros:
Annual raise up to 4%
Increased pay for picking up shifts
Good benefits
cons:
Understaffed
Management does not fix issues brought to their attention
High staff turnover

review_title: A Company with a Big Heart
pros:
Great benefits
Collaborative leadership team
Always open to suggestions from staff in all areas
They take the time to help you expand your knowledge and forge ahead in your career
Very fair wages
Great employee appreciation program 
Company is forward thinking and always growing ahead of the rest of the industry
cons: It is healthcare, so you won't get the summers off or a ton of holidays/snow days/time off, however this is not unique to Attic Angel. This is the nature of the industry. They do have a good PTO bank however.

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Middleton, WI
pros:
- worked with my school schedule
- wonderful residents 
- good pay
- pick up pay incentives
cons:
- constantly felt underappreciated 
- nurses barely listened to the CNAs when we would express concerns or change in a residents condition
- CNAs were unprofessional 
- management did not take concerns seriously when told

job_title: Senior Living Consultant in Middleton, WI
pros:
- Fair wages and benefits
- Kind, compassionate, and supportive staff
- Very welcoming environment

- Advancement opportunities
- Flexible schedule
- Great hours
- Benefits even for part-timers
- Caring community
- Good organization
cons: - Old fashioned timesheets so scheduling isn't as organized

review_title: not a great place to work
pros: Pay is good, residents are nice
cons: I really liked working here at first, but they have bad management.  They are always mandating and people are always quitting.  My particular manager didn't respond to most of my emails and I felt like she didn't care about staff.  Favoritism exists there, many people are passed over for med tech positions that they would have been good at.  There is also not a lot of teamwork if you are not in a certain clique.  There are a lot of childish employees there.  As I am posting this, there are 22 open positions because nobody wants to stay there.  Do yourself a favor and take your hard work and expertise somewhere else where you will be appreciated.

job_title: Memory Care Assistant in Middleton, WI
pros: The CNAs and MCAs are all great people and care a lot about the residents. The residents are a joy to work with.
cons: If someone calls in sick to work, you might get mandated to work the following shift even if you have somewhere else to be. Management seems a little out of touch with what is actually going on with residents on the floor. Supervisors are not as helpful to CNAs and MCAs as they could be.

review_title: For a 5 star facility, it leaves a lot to be desired
pros:
Working with the elderly
Making a difference in resident/family lives
cons:
Swing shifts
Mandatory overtime
Little incentive to pick up shifts
Poor communication
HIgh turnover

pros: Regardless of your position, you have an opportunity to grow professionally and personally as you work beside the "best of the best" in long term care services.  Staff, volunteers and residents are all incredible resources and mentors.
cons: That I can't spend more time with these amazing people!

review_title: Highest level of professionalism in a nursing home/assisted living community
pros: Good pay, good staff to patient ratio, pleasing environment, numerous activities
cons: Too expensive for many potential residents

job_title: Memory Care Assistant in Madison, WI
pros: Flexible Scheduling, Nice Coworkers, Wonderful benefits like free parking and coffee
cons: High stress work environment, lack of supervision
